  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140180</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140180</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Električno nihalo: Sprememba mase in naboja</string>
            <string language="en">Electrical pendulum: Variation of mass and charge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrisches Pendel: Variante der Masse und
der Ladung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pendule électrique : Variation de la masse
et de charge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pêndulo elétrico: Variação da massa e 
da carga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pendolo elettrico: Variazione di massa e 
della carica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικό εκκρεμές: Παραλλαγή της μάζας και της 
δαπάνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Péndulo eléctrico: Variación de la masa 
y de la carga</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">S povečanjem mase proporcionalno večamo tudi naboj in opazujemo vpliv na periodo električnega nihala na primeru nihanja večih teles.</string>
            <string language="en">Period, charge and mass of electrical pendulum and determining the relation between them by observing oscillation of many bodies of unequal mass and unequal charge.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">electrical pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">masa</string>
            <string language="en">mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">naboj</string>
            <string language="en">charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periode, Ladung und Masse des elektrischen 
Pendels und der Bestimmung der Relation zwischen ihnen durch das 
Beobachten von von Pendelbewegung vieler Körper der ungleichen Masse 
und der ungleichen Ladung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Période, charge et masse de pendule électrique 
et de déterminer la relation entre elles en observant l'oscillation 
de beaucoup de corps de la masse inégale et de charge inégale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Período, carga e massa do pêndulo elétrico e 
de determinar a relação entre elas observando a oscilação de 
muitos corpos da massa desigual e da carga desigual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Periodo, carica e massa di pendolo elettrico e di
determinazione del rapporto fra loro osservando oscillazione di molti 
corpi di massa disuguale e della carica disuguale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περίοδος, δαπάνη και μάζα του ηλεκτρικού εκκρεμούς 
και του καθορισμού της σχέσης μεταξύ τους με την παρατήρηση της 
ταλάντωσης πολλών οργανισμών της άνισης μάζας και της άνισης 
δαπάνης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Período, carga y masa del péndulo eléctrico y 
de determinar la relación entre ellas observando la oscilación de 
muchos cuerpos de la masa desigual y de la carga desigual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisches Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pendule électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pêndulo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carga</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pendolo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό εκκρεμές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μάζα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δαπάνη</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">masa</string>
